targets.rawSql: SELECT count(alarmID)*100/(SELECT count(alarmID) FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID =ar.AlarmRuleID Where  DateInserted between getdate()-7 and getdate() ) as 'FalsePostive %'FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID Where AlarmStatus = 5 AND DateInserted between getdate()-7 and getdate()

SELECT count(alarmID)*100/(SELECT count(alarmID) FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID =ar.AlarmRuleID Where  DateInserted between getdate()-10 and getdate() ) as 'FalsePostive %'FROM LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID Where AlarmStatus = 5 AND DateInserted between getdate()-10 and getdate()

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
  Priority,
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
   (SELECT alm.[AlarmDate], alm.AlarmStatus,atm.MARCMsgID FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alm JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm ON alm.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID) almm
		JOIN
	(SELECT 
		MsgID,
		(CASE WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 75 AND 89 THEN 'Very High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 AND 74 THEN 'High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 AND 64 THEN 'Medium' WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Low' END) AS Priority 
	FROM LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg) emsg 
			ON emsg.MsgID = almm.MARCMsgID
	WHERE
  $__timeFilter(almm.AlarmDate)
GROUP BY
  Priority
ORDER BY
  CASE Priority
    WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Very High' THEN 2
    WHEN 'High' THEN 3
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 4
    WHEN 'Low' THEN 5
  END

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
	AVG(amsg.TTR) avgTTR,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'High'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'Medium'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'Low'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Very Low'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
	AVG(amsg.TTR) avgTTR,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'High'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'Medium'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'Low'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Very Low'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
  Priority,
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
   (SELECT alm.[AlarmDate], alm.AlarmStatus,atm.MARCMsgID FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alm JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm ON alm.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID) almm
		JOIN
	(SELECT 
		MsgID,
		(CASE WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 75 AND 89 THEN 'Very High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 AND 74 THEN 'High' WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 AND 64 THEN 'Medium' WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Low' END) AS Priority 
	FROM LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg) emsg 
			ON emsg.MsgID = almm.MARCMsgID
	WHERE
  $__timeFilter(almm.AlarmDate)
GROUP BY
  Priority
ORDER BY
  CASE Priority
    WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Very High' THEN 2
    WHEN 'High' THEN 3
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 4
    WHEN 'Low' THEN 5
  END

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT TOP 1000 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases] WHERE
  $__timeFilter([Date Created])

select * from
 
(
SELECT p.FullName as "Case Owner",count(c.Name) as CaseCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When CaseStatusID = 1 Then 'Created'
When CaseStatusID = 2 Then 'Completed'
When CaseStatusID = 3 Then 'Incident'
When CaseStatusID = 4 Then 'Mitigated'
When CaseStatusID = 5 Then 'Resolved' End)) as CaseStatusID
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
  left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
WHERE  $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated)
group by p.FullName,CaseStatusID
 
) d
pivot
(
sum(CaseCount)
for CaseStatusID in (Created,Completed,Incident,Mitigated,Resolved)
) piv

select * from
 
(
SELECT p.FullName as "Case Owner",count(c.Name) as CaseCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When CaseStatusID = 1 Then 'Created'
When CaseStatusID = 2 Then 'Completed'
When CaseStatusID = 3 Then 'Incident'
When CaseStatusID = 4 Then 'Mitigated'
When CaseStatusID = 5 Then 'Resolved' End)) as CaseStatusID
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
  left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
WHERE  $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated)
group by p.FullName,CaseStatusID
 
) d
pivot
(
sum(CaseCount)
for CaseStatusID in (Created,Completed,Incident,Mitigated,Resolved)
) piv

SELECT TOP 1000 [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases] WHERE
  $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.Name = 'Incident'
